Ithaca Dragon Boat Club

The IDBC is an all-inclusive club with no experience needed to join! We are a fun and friendly team of all ages that enjoy spending time on Ithaca's beautiful Cayuga Lake waters. Whether you're looking to be part of a competitive team or just want to have fun on the water, there is a place for you and your friends.
